# Installation

Each admin user ("instructor") can [verify](https://nbgitpuller.readthedocs.io/en/latest/install.html) the presence of `nbgitpuller` on their hub presence

* open a `terminal` session
* run `pip install nbgitpuller`

# File Setup

The purpose of `nbgitpuller` is to ease access to files in a remote GitHub repository.

* create a GitHub repository
* place a `.ipynb` notebook file
* TO DO: test this on a private repository

# Create Link

Go to [this website](https://nbgitpuller.readthedocs.io/en/latest/link.html) (or later use a browser extension)

* URL for hub (e.g. https://ucmerced.2i2c.cloud)
* URL for repo (e.g. https://github.com/dsollberger/shared_stuff)
* indicate file name (i.e. the assignment's notebook)
* copy-and-paste generated link to assignment (i.e. back in Canvas)
